On this page

# Interface: AutoScaleMargins

Represents the margin used when updating a price scale.

## Properties[​](AutoScaleMargins.html#properties "Direct link to Properties"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Properties"} {#properties .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

### below[​](AutoScaleMargins.html#below "Direct link to below"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to below"} {#below .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **below**: `number`

The number of pixels for bottom margin

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### above[​](AutoScaleMargins.html#above "Direct link to above"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to above"} {#above .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **above**: `number`

The number of pixels for top margin
